questionTitle: The vase is definitely not ________, but just a very good imitation.
A wedding is a wonderful opportunity for ________ off new clothes.
These figures show a ________ in the number of unemployed people in England and Wales.
You'll need a visa ________ as your passport to go to the United States.
I'm afraid the lift is out of ________ so we'll have to walk up the stairs.
Timothy has lost a lot of money these last years in the casino. He is a ________ gambler.
The hotel receptionist said she would ________ what she could do about the dripping tap immediately.
The driver had to ________ quickly when the child stepped into the road.
To ________ to obey orders is a serious offence in the army.
"How can we ________ out together what we're to do if we never talk about it frankly?" she cried in desperation.
Two or three people were involved ________ the accident.
She may pride herself ________ her abitities, but she's not capable of bringing up children.
As the clouds drifted away an even higher peak became ________ to the climbers.
They lay almost flat and ________ through the tube-like underground passage.
They ________ her the truth.
Not all that ________ happened.
I told him to stop but he went on ________.
You are making too much noise! Stop ________ at once.
Tim was forced to leave his job but he got a very generous golden ________.
the spitting image of someone = ________.
